meanings.definition: Of or relating to the time or state after the Fall of man.
meanings.sent1: The postlapsarian world was filled with challenges and hardships.
meanings.sent2: The postlapsarian era marked a significant change in human history.
meanings.sent3: In the postlapsarian society, even the simplest tasks seemed more difficult.
meanings.sent4: Her postlapsarian perspective on life made her appreciate the beauty in imperfection.
meanings.sent5: The postlapsarian landscape was a stark contrast to the paradise that once existed.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of or resulting from the Fall of man.
meanings.sent1: The postlapsarian nature of his actions showed a clear departure from innocence.
meanings.sent2: The postlapsarian consequences of their choices were evident in the world around them.
meanings.sent3: Her postlapsarian humor often involved poking fun at human weaknesses.
meanings.sent4: The postlapsarian reality they faced was a reminder of their own mortality.
meanings.sent5: The postlapsarian atmosphere was heavy with the weight of past mistakes.
